intro: Our company is committed to quality and sustainability. Below you will find a selection of certifications of us and our suppliers that prove our manufacturing excellence, environmental responsibility, and compliance with international standards.
heading: Our Certificates
welcomeHeading: Welcome to Qingdao Lolin Mech Inc.

certificates.title: ISO 9001:2015
certificates.description: Quality Management System - demonstrating our capability to consistently provide high-quality products and services.

certificates.title: ISO 14001:2015
certificates.description: Environmental Management System - our commitment to sustainable and environmentally friendly production processes.

certificates.title: IATF 16949:2016 Laizhou Hongyuan
certificates.description: Automotive Quality Standard - for ensuring consistent quality in the automotive supply chain.

certificates.description: Automotive Quality Standard - for ensuring consistent quality in the automotive supply chain.
